title: Spiced fruits, nuts and seeds
ingredients: ['1 tsp cardamom pods', '2.5cm (1in) piece cinnamon stick', '2 whole cloves', '1 tsp black peppercorns', '1 tsp cumin seeds', '1 tsp coriander seeds', '2 tsp finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 large egg white', '25g (1oz) oats', '175g (6oz) blanched almonds', '175g (6oz) pecan nut halves', '175g (6oz) Brazil nuts', '85g (3oz) pumpkin seeds', '70g (2½oz) sunflower seeds', '115g (4oz) sultanas', '100g (3½oz) dried cranberries']
